snippet: On Jan. 9, 1968, the Surveyor 7 space probe made a soft landing on the moon.
abstract: On Jan. 9, 1968, the Surveyor 7 space probe made a soft landing on the moon.
lead_paragraph: On Jan. 9, 1968, the Surveyor 7 space probe made a soft landing on the moon. It was the final mission of the Surveyor program, a series of unmanned explorations of the lunar surface.

headline.main: Jan. 9, 1968 | NASA's Surveyor 7 Probe Makes Soft Landing on Moon
